front.title: Revised Default Values for the BGP 'Minimum Route Advertisement Interval'

abstract.t: This document briefly examines what is known about the effects of theBGP MRAI timer, particularly on convergence. It highlights publishedwork which suggests the MRAI interval as deployed has an adverseeffect on the convergence time of BGP.It then recommends revised, lower default values for the MRAI timer,thought to be more suited to today's Internet environment.
